specialAbilities.name: Pain Fulled
specialAbilities.description: While this model has 1 or more damage on it, it gains [+1] Mobility, and its melee attacks gain Unstoppable(1) and [+1] Rating.

actions.name: Come Hither
actions.description: Move the target 3" toward this model per success.

actions.name: Deadly Flourish
actions.description: This action can only be used if this model did not begin their activation engaged. Move this model up to 3" in a straight line. This model may move through, but not end on, enemy models during this move. After this movement this model may perform a [1] RATING melee attack on each enemy it passed through.

actions.name: Trident Strike
actions.description: Resonating Echo: If this attack generates a hit, the target, and all enemies within 2" of the target, gain Resonate.

actions.name: Gelatinous Shift
actions.description: This attack targets all Resonated enemies in range. On a success, expend Resonate from that enemy and deal them 1 damage. After resolving attacks, place this model anywhere within 3", and then place all targeted enemies in contact.

specialAbilities.name: Iron Will
specialAbilities.description: When targeted by a Will Attack, this model has [+2]WILLPOWER.
